itunes:title: Episode 551 - DB Sports Companion Show 02/18/20 - An NBA Win, And A NASCAR Loss
title: Episode 551 - DB Sports Companion Show 02/18/20 - An NBA Win, And A NASCAR Loss
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss how the new NBA All-Star game format was a afn favorite, how NASCAR failed to capitalize off the "Trump Bump" with a Daytona 500 rainout and the horrific crash by Ryan Newman, why the Astros players and owner shoul...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss how the new NBA All-Star game format was a afn favorite, how NASCAR failed to capitalize off the "Trump Bump" with a Daytona 500 rainout and the horrific crash by Ryan Newman, why the Astros players and owner should stop talking, and why Ross is betting the house on Tyson Fury over Deontay Wilder this weekend.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss how the new NBA All-Star game format was a afn favorite, how NASCAR failed to capitalize off the "Trump Bump" with a Daytona 500 rainout and the horrific crash by Ryan Newman, why the Astros players and owner should stop talking, and why Ross is betting the house on Tyson Fury over Deontay Wilder this weekend.
